Title: AN ACT AMENDING PARAGRAPH (G) OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SEVEN, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Data:
[ Act No. 3453, December 01, 1928 ]
AN ACT AMENDING PARAGRAPH (G) OF ACT NUMBERED THIRTY-FOUR HUNDRED AND TWENTY-SEVEN, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES.
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the t authority of the same:
Section 1. Paragraph (g) of Act Numbered Thirty-four hundred and twenty-seven is hereby amended to read as follows:
"(g) For the construction at Dipolog, Zamboanga, of the building of the Rizal Memorial Hospital . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . P20,000.00"
Section 2. Upon the completion of this building, the operation of the Rizal Memorial Hospital shall be conducted therein with the property, funds and personnel of the present hospital.1a—àphi1
Section 3. This Act shall take effect upon its approval.
Approved, December 1, 1928.
